data.title: Jill Scott's Best Moments | Essence
data.text:
Scott and Tony Award-winning actress Anika Noni Rose star in the new upcoming HBO series “The No.1 Ladies’ Detective Agency.” Here the two promote the show at the 2009 Winter Television Critics Association Press Tour held at the Universal Hilton Hotel in Universal City, California.

Read our exclusive interview with Jill Scott »

Jill poses for her ESSENCE cover near the Brooklyn Bridge. “A lot of things are on my mind. As a woman, I hear better, I smell better, my taste buds are different and I feel so much more like a sexual being than I ever have.”

Read our exclusive interview with Jill Scott »

Jill wears a Lafayette 148 New York dress and Alexis Bittar earrings. “I’ve learned a lot about men and mothers,” says Scott. “It’s truly amazing what’s happened to me and there’s a lot to say and I can’t wait to say it.”

Read our exclusive interview with Jill Scott »

Scott spent a good portion of her pregnancy taping her new HBO series, “The No. 1 Ladies’ Detective Agency.” “As pregnant as I am, I didn’t have time to enjoy my pregnancy because I was working in Botswana for four and a half months playing someone else,” says Jill (about her role on “The No. 1 Detectives Agency.”) It was a lot of hard work, and I’m not tripping about it because it was a wonderful opportunity and experience."

Read our exclusive interview with Jill Scott »

Jill is all smiles at our September 2007 cover shoot in Yonkers, New York. In the issue, the singer talks candidly with author Terry McMillan about her divorce from ex-husband and former manager Lyzell Williams.

Read our exclusive interview with Jill Scott »
